# buildBlock(_:_:_:)

**Type Method**

Combines multiple transfer representations into a single transfer representation.

## Declaration

```swift
static func buildBlock<C1, C2, C3>(_ content1: C1, _ content2: C2, _ content3: C3) -> TupleTransferRepresentation<Item, (C1, C2, C3)> where Item == C1.Item, C1 : TransferRepresentation, C2 : TransferRepresentation, C3 : TransferRepresentation, C1.Item == C2.Item, C2.Item == C3.Item
```

## Combining transfer representations

- **buildBlock(_:_:)**: Combines multiple transfer representations into a single transfer representation.
